<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4491</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mac an Cheannaí</string>
            <string language="es">Mac an Cheannaí</string>
            <string language="ga">Mac an Cheannaí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mac ein Cheannaí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Imper un Cheannaí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mac um Cheannaí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mac un Cheannaí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">MAC ένα Cheannaν</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Sample answers on a famous poem. Useful for the Higher Level optional course. Sample poetry answers on a famous Irish Poem. May be used as a chosen poem at HL.</string>
            <string language="es">Respuestas de muestra sobre este famoso poema. Útil para el curso opcional del nivel superior. Muestra de respuestas sobre poesía de un famoso poema irlandés. Puede utilizarse como un poema elegido en HL.</string>
            <string language="ga">Freagraí samplacha ar dhán cáiliúil.  Úsáideach don chúrsa roghnach ag AL.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Poetry</string>
            <string language="es">Poesía</string>
            <string language="ga">Filíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Additional Resource</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beispielantworten auf einem berühmten Gedicht. 
Nützlich für den höhere Stufe wahlweise freigestellten Kurs. 
Beispielpoesieantworten auf einem berühmten irischen Gedicht. 
Mag als gewähltes Gedicht an den HL verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réponses d'échantillon sur une poésie 
célèbre. Utile pour le cours facultatif de niveau plus 
élevé. Réponses de poésie d'échantillon sur une poésie 
irlandaise célèbre. Peut être utilisé comme poésie choisie 
à HL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Respostas da amostra em um poema famoso. 
Útil para o curso opcional do nível mais elevado. 
Respostas da poesia da amostra em um poema irish famoso. 
Pode ser usado como um poema escolhido em HL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risposte del campione su un poem famoso. 
Utile per il corso facoltativo del livello elevato. 
Risposte di poesia del campione su un poem irlandese famoso. 
Può essere usato come poem scelto agli HL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απαντήσεις δειγμάτων σε ένα διάσημο ποίημα. 
Χρήσιμος για την προαιρετική σειρά μαθημάτων πιό υψηλού 
επιπέδου. Απαντήσεις ποίησης δειγμάτων σε ένα διάσημο 
ιρλανδικό ποίημα. Μάιος χρησιμοποιείται ως επιλεγμένο 
ποίημα στα HL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
